name: 普通攻击
note:
<Critical Multiplier: 150%>

<Weapon Ranged>
<setup action>
clear battle log
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<whole action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  move user: targets, front, 15
else
  perform start
end
motion standby: user
wait for movement
face user: target
</whole action>

<target action>
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>

name: 防御
note: 1 号技能会在选择“防御”指令时使用。

name: 演示技能1-终结剑技
note:
<Setup Action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
wait for movement
</Setup Action>

<Whole Action>
perform action
motion wait: user
animation 25: targets
tint screen: sunset
wait for animation
flash screen: red, 20
shake screen: 10, 10, 30
wait: 20
enemy effect: targets, blink
action animation: enemies
action effect: enemies
show battle hud
tint screen: normal, 30
wait: 30
</Whole Action>

</setup action>

  move user: targets, front, 10
else

end

wait for movement

wait for opacity

wait for movement

ani wait: 3

motion attack: user
ani wait: 3
action effect
move user: targets, top, 5
wait for movement
move user: targets, front, 5

jump user: 200%, 10
face user: forward
wait for movement 
animation 278: targets
tint screen: sunset
wait for animation
flash screen: red, 20
wait: 10

action effect
show battle hud
tint screen: normal, 30
opacity not focus: 100%, 60
wait for opacity
</target action>

Battleback 4 Remove
